item.title: How to - using jupyter hub
item.description: The hub has MuST and ASE installed. Each user gets their own jupyter notebook environment on the hub. First time logging in: Click on “hub” to connect to the jupyter hub. Enter your username Choose a password (remember this password for future logins!) Click login Wait for your server to start Jupyter hub basics Once you log into the hub you will see Cloning the workshop exercises: Opening a terminal: Here are some useful documentation links:

item.title: About
item.description: This project was created for a MuST workshop at LSU. The Jupyter Hub runs on Jetstream - the NSF cloud. The image used to run the hub is ubunutu 18.04 with MuST, ASE and all their dependenies installed
